VALIDATION_ERROR: Please check your input and try again.
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
WEAK_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.
INVALID_NAME: Name must be between 2 and 50 characters.
UNSUPPORTED_LANGUAGE: Language not supported. Please choose from: English, Spanish, French, or German.
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in instead.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
AUTHORIZATION_REQUIRED: Authorization required. Please log in to access this resource.
INVALID_ACCESS_TOKEN: Invalid or expired access token. Please log in again.
INVALID_REFRESH_TOKEN: Invalid or expired refresh token. Please log in again.
INVALID_RESET_TOKEN: Invalid or expired password reset token.
UPDATE_FAILED: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to access this resource.
FILE_TOO_LARGE: File size exceeds the maximum allowed limit.
